descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=32] WaywardKnight\'s Ulfric Stormcloak [/b] [/size] 


[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11404-1-1330313550.jpg [/img]


[b] Version 1.0 features : [/b] 

Three new looks for Ulfric Stormcloak.

- - [color=red] Update #5 (11.11.12) : [/color] A year after Skyrim was released and my unforeseen hiatus is over. I will be releasing several new NPC variants in a compilation pack, which will be downloadable (hopefully) via the nifty NMM. 

In light of all this, I\'ve posted a new Ulfric variant. This one is loosely based on the actor Vladimir Kulich, who voices Ulfric in-game. Don\'t you fear, though. This one\'s not a giant.    

- [color=red] Update #4 (23.03.12) : [/color] I have posted a new link to Alternate Ulfric v1 in the downloads section. Thank you all for your patience. 

- [color=red] Update #3 (05.03.12) : [/color] I have gotten reports that the link for v3 Ulfric is down. I\'ve contacted support, so hopefully we can get this problem sorted out sooner than later.  

- [color=red] Update #2 (29.02.12) : [/color] As a reward for your continued downloads, I am releasing a new Ulfric. Enjoy! 

On a side note, I\'ve been informed that versions v1 and v3 are (somehow) still reversed. I think I\'ve got it sorted out. Please inform me immediately if this is not the case.    

- [color=red] Update #1 (27.02.12) : [/color] Ulfric v1 and v3 should be in their proper places. Thank you for your patience. 

[size=6] Savegames and presets available upon demand! [/size]

[b] To install : [/b] 

Simply copy and paste into your [i] skyrim/Data [/i] folder.


[b] To uninstall : [/b]

Delete Ulfric.esp and the file [i] 0001414d.nif [/i], which can be found in : 

[i] C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm [/i]   


[b] To switch between versions : [/b]

1. Uncheck Ulfric.esp in the Nexus Mod Manager or default Bethesda launcher. Once that\'s complete, close the launcher. 

2. Find and delete the following files: 

[i] - Ralof.esp 
- 0001414d.nif [/i]  

3. Install the version you\'d like to use.  


[b] My other mods : [/b]

[b] WKC - Ralof : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11145

[b] WKC - Hadvar : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11136

[b] WKC - Ysolda ; [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11413 


[b] Recommended mods for male characters : [/b]  

[b] XCE (Xenius Character Enhancement) : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356

[b] Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

[b] High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4141 


[b] [size=6] More to come. [/b] [/size]
author: WaywardKnight
